text:
Quick question: I want to push my local code for a custom react project in GitHub and then link that repo to HubSpot. My question is what folder do I push to the GitHub repo?

My current folder structure is like this:
1. root-folder
 1.1. custom-project
 1.1.1 custom-project-app
 1.1.1.1. [react-components]
 1.2 custom-project-theme
 1.2.1 [theme-related-files]
